headline:
A flexible and easy way to 
connect and extend enterprise applications in a cloud-native world

mission.headline:
Kyma mission: 
Make simple things simple again!
paragraphs: Kyma aims to equip enterprise software users with agile tools to customize, extend, and integrate any API-enabled application and tailor it to their needs.

Kyma makes the development and operation of microservices-based solutions easy by providing consistent service management capabilities and the integration of the existing enterprise software in a service-oriented manner.

whatIs.headline: What is Kyma?
paragraphs: Kyma is a cloud-native application development framework.

It provides the last mile capabilities that a developer needs to build a cloud-native application using several open-source projects such as Kubernetes, Istio, NATS, Kubeless, and Prometheus, to name a few.
It is designed natively on Kubernetes and, therefore, it is portable to all major cloud providers.

features.headline: Open and extendable
bulletPoints: Unify the consumption of internal and external services through the Open Service Broker standard-compliant Service Catalog.

features.headline: Seamless connectivity
bulletPoints: Leverage HTTP/2 for optimized latency and payload.
Ensure flexible add-on triggers, including Events and HTTP requests.

features.headline: Coherent and technology-independent
bulletPoints: A programming language-agnostic add-on model that allows you to customize a software solution using the technology stack you are most experienced with.
